1111121.content:
Usagi crammed the last of the doughnut--her fourth of the morning--into her mouth as she dashed to school. She'd overslept, and, worse, not realized it until she was in the middle of fixing breakfast. Her belly, which jutted over the waistband of her school skirt a little, grumbled unhappily. She was used to getting a much better breakfast, but she'd be in serious trouble if she was late to school again.

Her morning classes were only slightly more unbearable than normal, but by lunchtime, she was famished. Usagi bought two big meals and wolfed them both down, not worrying about her slightly-protruding tummy because she figured she was just making up for skipping breakfast, and besides, she had a great metabolism, so it didn't matter how much she ate. This was just a little food bloating, definitely nothing to worry about.

However, even though she didn't notice her small gain, someone else did...

111112111222.content:
For the next seven days, Usagi would go to Mako's for a healthy snack. No matter how delicious the food served was, no matter how healthy, be it a small little thing or something rather elaborate, it always left the blond haired girl wanting more. And so, inevitably, like anyone wanting more food, between meals she would snack on candies and chocolates of all sorts. Of course, neither Ami or Mako saw any of this.

So, logically, when both saw that Usagi was visibly chubbier by the end of the week, they were both baffled.

"I don't get it," Ami said, "What have you been feeding her, Mako?"

"Well, look, I've been eating exactly what she has been eating, and I'm perfectly fine," Mako responded, gesturing toward her abs, which were unchanged.

Ami scratched her chin, pondering the situation. "I thought these snacks might curb her hunger, but evidently she's eating more food outside of our healthy alternatives. We need 24 hour surveillance on her to make sure she doesn't eat anything. So we need to get Chibiusa in on this whole dieting thing."

1111121112221.content:
"...And you're sure you can help us?" Mako finished. Chibiusa nodded, her pigtails bouncing up and down.

"Sure. I mean, Usagi tries to hide all the junk she buys so I can't get at it, but she's not any better at hiding stuff than she is at dieting."

Plan made, Chibiusa returned to the Tsukino residence. She called out for Usagi's family, but no one answered. It looked like she was home alone. Excellent. As quickly as she could, Chibusa went around to all the places where she'd seen Usagi stash contraband in the past. Her diligence was rewarded with a variety of candy, plus a package of cookies.

Just then, Chibiusa heard the front door open. Thinking quickly, she dumped all the snacks she'd stolen into her backpack. She barely managed to zip it up before Usagi came into the kitchen. "Oh, hi!" she said nervously. "What brings you in here?" Mentally, she was slapping herself for being so obviously suspicious, but she wasn't used to sneaking around. Luckily, Usagi was too preoccupied to notice.

"Oh, er, nothing!" the blonde replied, a little too quickly. "I just wanted to see if anyone else was home! I certainly wasn't coming in here for something to eat!"

Chibiusa thought that maybe she wasn't so bad at this after all, if this was what she was up against. Usagi lapsed into guilty, awkward silence before sidling out of the kitchen. So Ami and Mako had been right, at least: Usagi was definitely sneaking food. Now, the big question was what Chibiusa should do with it.

The little girl considered throwing it away, but there was the possibility that Usagi would find it there before it got covered up with other trash. She didn't want to take it outside in case Usagi opened up her backpack for some reason. Burying it would be way too much work, not to mention extremely conspicuous. If she hid it in the room she and Usagi shared, Usagi would be sure to find it. Chibiusa gulped. It looked like, in order to keep the junk food out of Usagi's reach, she would have to eat it herself. That way, even if Usagi saw the wrappers in the trash, she wouldn't be able to do anything.

Furtively, she unzipped her backpack and took out a few pieces of candy. Usagi probably wouldn't dare come back into the kitchen until she saw Chibiusa leave, but even so, the pink-haired girl wanted to be as careful as possible. She sat at the kitchen table with her back to the door and her backpack on her lap, hunched over to try and hide the evidence. Cramming the candy in her mouth, she chewed and swallowed quickly before shoving in another handful of snacks. Under other circumstances, she would have taken time to enjoy the candy, but she didn't know how long she had before someone else got home and stumbled onto her.

When she finally finished the candy and cookies, Chibiusa was extremely full. Her belly jutted forward disconcertingly, and she felt a little ill. Nevertheless, she was proud of herself for helping Mako and Ami with their plan. She dumped the candy wrappers and empty cookie package in the trash, covered them inexpertly with a couple paper towels, and sat back down at the table. If she left now, there was a chance Usagi would come in and find out what she'd done, so she stayed in the kitchen looking at books until Usagi's past-mom came home. Or, at least, she pretended to look at books. Most of her attention was, in fact, focused on rubbing her round stomach and trying to make it hurt a little less.

Over the next week, it seemed like there was more hidden junk food every time Chibiusa had a chance to do a sweep of the kitchen or bedroom. Where was Usagi even getting all this stuff? Ami and Mako had said that they were watching Usagi whenever she went out, but the blonde was still apparently finding time to sneak away and buy things she shouldn't eat.

Not that she got to eat much of it; Chibiusa made sure of that. It gradually got easier for the little girl to keep up, gastronomically speaking, with the junk Usagi brought home, but Chibiusa wasn't convinced that that was a good thing. The belly she'd developed on that first afternoon quickly became a permanent feature, and she was convinced that the rest of her was getting pudgier as well.

From Mako and Ami's point of view, though, Usagi's diet was back on track. The blonde didn't lose any weight, but considering that she'd gained the week before, keeping a stable weight was pretty darn good. They would have to remember to thank Chibiusa for doing such a good job next time they saw her.

11111211122211.content:
"Well, the plan seems to be going smoothly..." Ami mumbled, noticing Usagi's skirt, stretched out by her pudgier belly, hanging over her still curvy hips. Clearly she was losing weight, ever so slowly, over the past couple weeks since they first concocted their plot with Chibiusa. Initially, it had been fairly tricky making sure Usagi didn't sneak treats, but now, at the very least, they had Usagi's weight under control.

"I wonder how Chibiusa's doing, though," Mako replied, "She's probably put on some weight, taking all that candy from Usagi."

"Well, she couldn't have gained that much. We told her to dispose of the candy, not eat it," Ami replied, laughing at such a silly concept as eating all the candy that Chibiusa would steal. After all, why not just feed it to the birds or allow it to return to the earth in an environmentally save way? That would be the logical, mature decision to make--

"Chibiusa's a kid. She's not gonna just ignore all that candy," Mako replied, frowning.

Ami and Mako followed Usagi home under the pretense they were going to hang out, which they were. Still, they wanted to ensure Chibiusa was alright. Mako's comments left Ami uncertain. Was putting a child in a situation like this responsible? Ami imagined all the health issues that came with obesity. Was this, in actuality, causing far more harm than good? Was Ami just creating another candy addicted girl to force into diets?

Ami had her answer once she saw Chibiusa.

Though she wasn't fat, she sure was a chubby girl, round and rolly-polly. Her pudgy hands caressed her belly gingerly, her thick fingers massaging the flesh to ensure the thick chunks of food didn't just sit still in her intestines. Her round cheeks were a shade of sickly green, no doubt from over-consumption of sweets. As Mako talked to Usagi, guiding her away, Ami approached the pink haired girl, nervously. "Uh, Chibiusa, did you eat all of Usagi's candy?"

"What does it look like I did?" Chibiusa said before burping. Cupping pudgy fingers over her list, blushing, she mumbled "Uh, 'scuse me."

"This is awful! You're getting fat. You're fatter than Usagi is. Listen, from now on, give us all the candy you steal, alright? That way we can get rid of it without it going straight to your waistline, okay?"

"No, I'll be fine!" Chibiusa protested. "I haven't gained that much, and I'm sure I can think of a better way to get rid of it. Plus, if you guys have it, Usagi will probably find it all when she hangs out with you."

"Well, if you're sure you can do something other than just eat it..." Ami said hesitantly.

"I'm completely sure! Don't worry about me!" Chibiusa said, smiling reassuringly. That seemed to be enough for Ami and Mako, though the former looked awfully doubtful. Still, they left her alone, which was what Chibiusa was after.

Of course, she had no intention of giving up Usagi's junk food. Eating as much candy as she wanted was every young girl's dream, and Chibiusa had grown to enjoy the overstuffed feeling she got from pigging out on Usagi's treats. She had to wait until Mako and Ami left, though, or they'd know she lied to them. The wait was torture. Chibiusa preferred to keep her belly full, and she was starting to get pretty hungry. Finally, after what felt like ages, Usagi's friends headed home. Chibiusa raced into the kitchen and checked Usagi's normal "secret hiding places."

Sure enough, she came away with an armload of candy and other snacks. Good old Usagi, she never bothered to figure out better hiding spots even after her food started disappearing. Chibiusa finished the whole stash without much of a problem. Sure, she felt a little overfull, but it was a good feeling. She didn't understand why Ami wanted to take that away from her.

Over the next couple weeks, the only exercise Chibiusa got was hiding from Ami and Mako whenever they came over to the Tsukino's. If they saw her, they'd realize that she was still eating all Usagi's candy, and then they'd take it away from her. Chibiusa wasn't having any of that. She was still stuffing herself silly at least once a day in addition to her normal food intake, and as a result, she was quickly sliding from "chubby" to "fat." Her stomach, which had borne the brunt of her gain, muffined hugely over anything she tried to fasten around it, and covered up a good deal of her lap when she sat down. Her thighs were starting to rub together when she walked, and she'd developed a second chin and maybe even the start of a third. Chibiusa didn't mind any of this. She wasn't trying to get fat, exactly, but she really liked stuffing herself and never bothered to exercise, so gaining weight was the inevitable conclusion.

However, all good things must end, and eventually...

The truth was that Ami's goals had finally paid off, and the blond haired girl now, for once, had lost all desire to eat excessive junk. She had slimmed down to a healthier weight, svelte and slender. One of her first actions as a healthy individual was to stop buying junk food, which she happily did. "Ya know, maybe you should start dieting," Ami commented, glancing over at Chibiusa's overstuffed flesh.

111112112.content:
“What? What’re you saying, that’s not true!” Rei said indignantly, puffing out her cheeks as she glared at Ami indignantly.

“Ami’s right though, Rei. I mean, you go out of your way to point out my gain, but look at you!” the blonde said, poking her friend’s gut. “Looks like you’ve really been packing on the pounds lately, huh?”

It was true, after all. Rei had certainly plumped up, having gained about 35 lbs. within the past few weeks, putting her at 148 lbs. And it truly was obvious, moreso than Usagi’s own minor weight gain by comparison.

First, there was the brunette’s gut, which was one of the most noticeable areas that had been affected. It had developed a rounded curve, a creamy collection of adipose that was pushing past the hem of her skirt and causing her shirt to ride up by a fair amount. It had quite a bit of jiggle to it, as well, made evident whenever Rei decided to move in any substantial way. A muffin-top had definitely begun to form, her flesh pooling around her sides and creating a fledgling spare tire in her front.

Rei’s posterior had also seen some change, creating a bubble butt that was pressing up against the back areas of her school uniform’s skirt. If one could look underneath, they’d see that her panties were being strained by the extra amount of flesh that they had to contain. The fabric hadn’t begun tearing yet, but it was certainly straining.

The Sailor Senshi’s chest had also grown, giving her boobs that were each somewhat big, although nothing extraordinary. Her bra, though, was having a bit of a hard time keeping them contained, the bags of fat pushing against it and her shirt with all their might.

Her calves and thighs had also become quite chunky, not at the point of chafing together, but not too far off, either. Her arms and hands, though, had seen very little of her gain, only her arms actually thickening to any noticeable extent.

Rei’s face was also relatively untouched, only the beginnings of a double chin showing anything really changed there at all, but her visage still kept the same relative amount of sharpness it always had.

At the moment, Rei even had a whole stash of candy and chips in her newly-bought purse, to provide her with “energy” throughout the day.
